levelledPara.title: Scope
levelledPara.para: This data module defines corrosion prevention and control practices for AMPEL360 PLUS airframe structures and components.

levelledPara.title: Protective Systems
levelledPara.para: Approved coatings, treatments, and material combinations to prevent galvanic and environmental corrosion in space tourism applications.

levelledPara.title: Inspection Requirements
levelledPara.para: Regular inspection intervals and criteria for identifying and addressing corrosion in critical airframe components.

levelledPara.title: Cross-References
levelledPara.para: For engine mount corrosion control, see ATA-71/72/73. For landing gear corrosion control, see ATA-32.
